turns.content: what is this language : Dsvmh ivhvhhrxv iudqfhv xq hpsorl hu qrxv vhqv. \n\nFvezi revirippzi rdlevzi pzi irksvim ri rizmvev.

The language appears to be a simple substitution cipher where each letter has been replaced by a different letter. Without knowing the key used to create this cipher, it's impossible to decipher the message.
